plot: A young couple travel to a sleepy Scottish town to start work on a genteel nature documentary - but find themselves drawn to a juicy local story involving shocking events of the past.

Davis and his girlfriend Pia visit his mother in Loch Henry, Scotland, to produce a documentary. While there they discover the town's dark past, an event that caused tourism to entirely dry up and which involved Davis's policeman father. Davis and Pia decide to make a documentary on this subject instead.—grantss
